page.title: 03A LUNCHEON CLUB
page.content: A Luncheon Club is run in the village hall on four days a week. The club starts at 12 o'clock and fifteen people come usually. The Catering Supervisor said to us that he puts the food in the freezer and he opened some of the dinner and we saw some quite nice things. It was potato and things like that. They had a turbo wave oven that cooked food quickly. He showed us a big box where they could put food to take around the village to people who cannot get out. A lady collects this in a van.
